text: Hello all, a lot of our pages have page depth that is too far from the homepage. I had explored the use of internal links for the issue which helped but we have a lot of pages with this issue. Is there any other way of resolving this? I will appreciate any assistance on this.
Hi Stephen could you share the site with me?

```content-visibility```
I don't think It will be a good idea because most of the browser doesn't support content-visibility.

<@UDK7MSQUE>, yes i have had a significant decrease in loading time in a client Website. <@U03GHANKUF2>: well,  most of the users are using Chrome these days, they can enjoy the increase in speed while everything still works for everyone else.
yes <@UBT0AHWLD> for chrome it is working but when I used then position property was not working in chrome.
